entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 11:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: NW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
